main event: Several observers in Lebanon, Ohio saw a bright light in the sky on November 13, 1964, which appeared stationary, then dimmed until it was no longer visible.
interesting points: The object was consistent with the description of an aircraft,Several aircraft were reported in the area at the time of the sighting,There were multiple witnesses who noticed the object changing brightness,The sighting lasted until the object became too dim to see,The report concluded with the possibility of the object being an aircraft.
sighted object: A bright light in the sky
